DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct compare safety efficacy loteprednol etabonate vehicle treatment postoperative inflammation pain follow cataract surgery .
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation Loteprednol Etabonate Versus Vehicle Treatment Inflammation Pain Following Cataract Surgery
DOC.criteria: Subjects least 18 year age . Subjects candidate routine , uncomplicated cataract surgery . Subjects know hypersensitivity contraindication study drug component . Subjects severe/serious ocular condition , unstable medical condition , investigator 's opinion may preclude study treatment followup . Subjects elevate intraocular pressure ( > /=21mm Hg ) , uncontrolled glaucoma , treat glaucoma study eye . Subjects monocular pinholed Snellen visual acuity ( VA ) 20/200 bad nonstudy eye .
